name: Rapid Strikes
description: Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with five consecutive attacks that each deal 343 Physical Damage. Each hit increases the damage of the subsequent hit by 3%.  The final hit deals 300% more damage.
effectLines: Each hit increases the damage of the subsequent hit.
coefDescription: Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with five consecutive attacks that each deal $1 Physical Damage. Each hit increases the damage of the subsequent hit by 3%.  The final hit deals 300% more damage.
rawDescription:
Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with five consecutive attacks that each deal <<1>>. Each hit increases the damage of the subsequent hit by <<2>>.

The final hit deals <<3>> more damage.
